metadata.title: CVE-2018-14668 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In ClickHouse before 1.1.54388, "remote" table function allowed arbitrary symbols in "user", "password" and "default_database" fields which led to Cross Protocol Request Forgery Attacks.

criterions.comment: clickhouse package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
